Caustic.h

This file defines the published interface for talking to the Caustic Renderer.  This include is usually the top level include that clients will use.

Caustic
namespace
Caustic
IRenderer

Defines the interface clients use to talk to the renderer

Functions
Setup
virtual void Setup(
HWND hwnd,
std::wstring &shaderFolder,
bool createDebugDevice
) = 0

Initializes the renderer. Applications need to call this method at startup.

Parameters
hwnd
HWND

window to bind renderer to

shaderFolder
std::wstring&

path to shader folder

createDebugDevice
bool

True if application wants the debug D3D device. False otherwise.
